pre_caption: This is a scenery shot showing the aftermath of an incident at the Pentagon. Thick smoke billows from the side of the building, where emergency vehicles are gathered. In the foreground, a minivan drives past on a highway, and people are seen on the lawn between the road and the building.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a scenery shot showing the aftermath of an incident at the Pentagon. Thick smoke billows from the side of the building, where emergency vehicles are gathered. In the foreground, a minivan drives past on a highway, and people are seen on the lawn between the road and the building.
initial_feedback:
A silver minivan is parked next to the roadside railing, but not moving.
Two cars are seen driving past one after the other from right to left in the foreground.
